definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
empty hand, empty fist (idiom); having nothing to rely on/unarmed and defenseless

sentences.english: Incredible as it seems, live high voltage transmission lines can be worked barehanded.
sentences.chinese: 令人难以置信的，带电高压输电线路可以赤手操作。

sentences.english: An ex post facto law prohibits the use of guns by individuals against unarmed persons trespassing on their property.
sentences.chinese: 事后法阻止个人对赤手空拳的财产侵犯者使用枪支。

sentences.english: How can you be a hero if you are unarmed?
sentences.chinese: 你就这样赤手空拳的，怎么当英雄啊？

sentences.english: In the uprising the serfs fought with bare hands against gunfire.
sentences.chinese: 在暴动中，农奴们以赤手空拳对付钢枪铁炮。

sentences.english: You don't need a sword. You've still got your fist.
sentences.chinese: 不一定要用刀，赤手空拳也能杀人。

sentences.english: They attacked  him with their bare hands.
sentences.chinese: 他们赤手空拳地攻击他。

sentences.english: Bare hands just will not do the job.
sentences.chinese: 赤手空拳不能做这些事情。

sentences.english: Her barehanded whether come true from commonplace to the success perfect very quickly?
sentences.chinese: 赤手空拳的她能否实现从平庸到成功的完美一跃？

sentences.english: The masses held off the aggressors with their hands.
sentences.chinese: 人群赤手空拳地抗击侵略者。

sentences.english: Does our bare hand deal with Long Wang?
sentences.chinese: 难道我们赤手空拳去对付龙王？

sentences.english: The policeman smote the hoodlums with his bare fist.
sentences.chinese: 警察赤手空拳打这些无赖。

sentences.english: The famous boxer killed a fierce wolf with his bare hands.
sentences.chinese: 那位著名的拳击师赤手空拳打死了一头凶猛的恶狼。

definition: empty hand, empty fist (idiom); having nothing to rely on/unarmed and defenseless
empty-handed/unarmed/(painting, embroidery etc) without following a model/(abbr. for 空手道[kong1 shou3 dao4]) karate
pitchfork/garden fork/restraining pole (used by police)/military fork (of ancient times)
extraordinary strength/super strong/strong as an ox
lit. to turn over one's palm/fig. everything is going very well.
